banner.title: PS GROUP
banner.subtitle: Proffessional ESOP and Trust Services Provider

system.title: ESOP Management System
system.content: PS Group's ESOP Management system has multiple functions, covering grant data management, agreements online signing, exercise and tax services, rule management, withdrawal services, financial statement support, etc.

service.title: ESOP Management Services
service.content: PS Group has the licenses and qualification of trust, brokerage, system service and other services. Customers do not need to purchase multi-party single service provider, which gives customers ideal solution compared to heavy workload and high communication cost under the traditional service mode. The key staff of PS Group have more than 10 years of experience in the ESOP management industry. PS team provide quick respond and flexibly customized solutions, such as formulating relevant operating rules, and pay attention to the changes and implementation of relevant regulations and policies such as taxation and administration of foreign exchange.

enterprise.title: Enterprise Services
enterprise.content: PS Group mainly provides ESOP trust services for enterprises. Companies with overseas structure to be listed, listed or H-share companies can set up ESOP trusts based on various management needs to assist their ESOP plans management.

familyTrust.title: Family Trust
familyTrust.content: PS Group sets up family trusts for settlors, and the settlors transfers part of their personal assets into the trusts for various trust purposes such as asset preservation, asset integration, tax planning and family inheritance.

familyOffice.title: Family Office
familyOffice.content: PS Group assists clients in the design and construction of family offices, provides comprehensive family services, optimizes the governance of family, improves the risk planning and investment management of family wealth, establishes family cultural inheritance, and strengthens family cohesion.

stable-system.title: A Stable and Powerful Management System

online-esop.title: Handling ESOP Management Process Online
online-esop.content: After determining the incentive plan and the beneficiaries, you can use the one-stop platform of PS Group to complete comprehensive online processing, such as grant document signing, information change, exercise transaction, tax calculation and income repatriation.

detail.title: Focus on Key Points, Attention to Details
detail.content-1: Online Signing Function: Supports efficient and convenient online signing, downloading agreement related documents in multiple links such as granting and exercising rights.
detail.content-2: Exercising Transaction Management: Diversified management can be carried out on the quantity, price, time, exercise transaction method and other elements of the designated object in the exercise transaction from multiple latitudes such as participants, grant, and ownership.
detail.content-3: Calculation and Reporting of Amortization Expenses: Based on SBC, amortization of expenses and generation of disclosure reports in compliance with GAAP and IFRS.

custimize.title: Support Full Self-service Management Needs
custimize.content: Through the flexible authority distribution function, each module of the platform can authorize administrators to perform self-service queries, information update, transaction processing and report generation at any time.

admin.title: Administrator Services
admin.content-1: Comprehensive guidance and assistance from system launch to daily operation
admin.content-2: Assist in connecting with other relevant third parties in the ESOP operation process
admin.content-3: Based on extensive experience and professional knowledge to give advice on specific scenarios

keep-notice.title: Continued Focus on Relevant Markets <1></1> and Professional Fields

forex.title: Foreign Exchange Settlement Process and Flow Management

tax.title: Tax Advisory
tax.content: No. 69 [2021] of the State Administration of Taxation and No.35 [2005] of the Ministry of Finance and State Taxation Administration report preparation

rule.title: Compliance Advisory
rule.content: Compliance issues related to the granting of equity incentives, the exercise of rights and the repatriation of proceeds

about.title: Learn PS Group
about.content: <1>Based in Hong Kong, PS Group is a professional equity incentive and trust services provider under Valuable Capital Limited. Leveraging the advantages of the Hong Kong International Financial Center and the group's strong technology research and development capabilities, PS Group is committed to providing customers with higher quality financial value-added services. PS Group integrates licensed professional institutions in various related fields and solves pain points in cross-border services through comprehensive and coordinated service teams in Hong Kong, Taipei, Beijing, Shanghai, Shenzhen, Changsha, Singapore, and other locations. With rich industry experience, agile response speed, and professional service level, PS Group provides customers with comprehensive corporate services that are forward-looking, flexible, and operational, including equity incentives, offshore trusts, digital management of corporate capital, and capital market communication.</1><2>Valuable Capital Limited is a leading technology financial comprehensive enterprise and has provided efficient, accurate, comprehensive, and high-quality services to millions of retail individuals, institutions, and corporate customers worldwide. Currently, the group has established branches in mainland China, Hong Kong, Singapore, New Zealand, the United States, and Saudi Arabia, and its services cover mainstream financial markets worldwide.</2><2>The subsidiaries of Valuable Capital Limited hold licenses numbered 1, 2, 4, 5, and 9 issued by the Hong Kong Securities and Futures Commission (CE No.: AUL711), which qualify them to provide securities trading, futures contract trading, advice on securities, advice on futures contracts, and asset management.</2>

banner.title: PS TRUST
banner.subtitle: Expertise You Can Trust, Results You Can Depend On

service.familyTrustIntroduction: The settlor transfers the ownership of the property to the trustee through a trust arrangement. Based on the agreement of trust law, the legal ownership and beneficial ownership of the property are separated, and the trustee manages and distributes the property according to the interests of the beneficiaries, so as to achieve proper inheritance, asset protection, privacy and security purposes.

optionScene.label: Application Scenario
optionScene.content: Based on the needs of flexible management and entrusted shareholding, Listed Company or Pre-IPO Company in Hong Kong or in the U.S. established ESOP Trust to hold equity/stock on behalf of the incentive objects. After the conditions are met, according to the company's confirmation and relevant documents, PS Trust arranges the sale of stocks and income distribution.

optionTarget.label: Target Users
optionTarget.content-1: Companies going to list and already setting up an overseas structure
optionTarget.content-2: Companies listed in the US or Hong Kong

optionUsage.label: Purpose of ESOP Trust
optionUsage.content-1: Combined with PS Group equity incentive management system, to provide one-stop equity incentive services
optionUsage.content-2: Professional trust services, providing solutions for various management pain points of ESOP management
optionUsage.content-3: Ensure the safety of company assets, taking into account company control and employee incentives

rightIntroduction.label: Learn about Reserved Powers Trust
rightIntroduction.content: As trust jurisdictions, Hong Kong, Singapore and some other countries or regions allow the establishment of retained power trusts. Compared with discretionary trusts, reserved power trusts can reserve the investment power of trust assets to the settlor without compromising the validity of the trust itself.

usage-1.title: Asset Protection
usage-1.content: Through a reasonable trust structure arrangement, the assets placed in the trust can be exempted from creditors' recourse and legal inheritance restrictions, and undistributed trust assets can also be exempted from the beneficiary's creditors' recourse and marital property claims.

usage-2.title: Integrate Asset
usage-2.content: Based on the circumstances and background of the trust settor and the beneficiary, we can provide a reasonable structure based on the professional opinions of relevant expert consultants, so as to realize the holding of different types of overseas assets and integrate family wealth into one structure. After death, family members can continue to invest under the trust.

usage-3.title: Family Heritage
usage-3.content: Through reasonable trust arrangements, the collection of ownership and control rights of family businesses can be achieved, avoiding mandatory inheritance regulations, avoiding the process of probate and will disputes, and realizing the proper inheritance of family assets

usage-4.title: High Confidentiality
usage-4.content: Under the premise of legal compliance, the assets in the trust (asset type and total amount) can realize privacy protection, and the identities and interests of the relevant parties of the trust are also highly confidential

insuranceIntroduction.label: Learn about Insurance Trust
insuranceIntroduction.content: The settlor and the trustee sign an insurance trust deed. When an insured event occurs, the insurance company will deliver the claims to the trustee, and the trustee will manage it according to the contract, and distribute the trust assets to the beneficiary according to the settlor's wishes during the trust period.

insuranceUsage.label: Purpose of Insurance Trust
insuranceUsage.content: Combining trust with life insurance products, while enjoying the protection of life insurance products, it also endows trust assets with flexible management, inheritance of intention, privacy and confidentiality and other characteristics.

foreignGrantorIntroduction.label: Learn about Foreign Grantor Trust
foreignGrantorIntroduction.content: The definition of the U.S. tax law needs to meet the two conditions of a non-U.S. trust (Foreign Trust) and a grantor trust (Grantor Trust). If a trust is recognized as a non-U.S. Income is subject to U.S. tax, and distributions from the trust to beneficiaries are also exempt from U.S. tax.

foreignGrantorUsage.label: Purpose of Foreign Grantor Trust
foreignGrantorUsage.content: Established by a non-U.S. tax resident as grantor, foreign grantor Trust provides wealth and inheritance planning for U.S. Beneficiaries. Such trusts are set up with the tax advice of a U.S. tax attorney and are structured to help one or more U.S. beneficiaries with U.S. tax liabilities reasonably plan for future issues to reasonably minimize their potential U.S. gift and inheritance tax.

charitableIntroduction.label: Learn about Charitable Trust
charitableIntroduction.content: Individuals and families can realize their charitable wishes by establishing a Charitable Trust and applying for tax incentives.

usage-1.title: Achieve tax optimization
usage-1.content: Charitable Trust can apply for tax incentives

usage-2.title: Achieve Charitable Wishes
usage-2.content: A well-run family Charitable Trust can allow family members and future generations to participate in the management of family philanthropy, enable posterity to understand family culture and values through participation in family philanthropy, provide methods for family governance, and cultivate a society for family members and future generations responsibility

familyOfficeIntroduction.label: Learn about Family Office
familyOfficeIntroduction.content: According to the needs of customers, we will integrate professional institutions such as investment consultants, lawyers and tax consultants, tailor a full range of comprehensive family services for customers, assist customers in building equity structures and Family Office, and optimize the governance and wealth planning of customers' families.

familyOfficeUsage.label: Purpose of Family Office
familyOfficeUsage.content: Assist clients in designing and building Family Office, provide a full range of comprehensive family services, optimize client family governance, strengthen risk planning and investment management of family wealth, establish family cultural heritage, and reach consensus on family unity.

familyOthers.label: Related Articles
familyOthers.question-1: Is it necessary to set up a Family Trust for a single Family Office?
familyOthers.question-2: In-depth analysis of the new regulations of Singapore family office

advance-1.title: Comprehensive Services
advance-1.content: The PS ESOP management system and trading system are interconnected, providing one-stop equity incentive management, vesting in trust, exercise, trading and other full-process services, reducing the company's workload and improving the experience of enterprises and employees.

advance-2.title: Efficient Response
advance-2.content: PS Trust has service teams in mainland China, Hong Kong and Singapore which can respond to various needs of customers efficiently.

advance-3.title: Experienced
advance-3.content: The members of PS team are from well-known consulting and financial institutions with experience in providing customized  trust solutions for hundreds of companies covering well-known enterprises in various industries.

advance-4.title: Regulatory Compliance
advance-4.content: PS Trust Limited is a trust company with company service provider license (TCSP: TC006201) under the Hong Kong Anti-Money Laundering and Counter-Terrorism Financing Ordinance (Chapter 615).

assets.title: Security of Assets
assets.content: The trust assets are entrusted to the licensed trust company and protected by the trust law. The trust assets are not subject to risks such as bankruptcy, liquidation and debt of the trustee.

data.title: Security Data
data.content: Identify confidential data in service data and build a special isolation safe room to ensure the security of confidential data transmission and storage.
